revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Telsey |model=CPVL7 |revision=(2GGV) |est_release_date=11/2011 |manuf_country=Italy |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router, dsl modem, analog phone gateway, ONT |pcb_id=TP460B2F |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6369;BCM6369KPBG; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL128P90TFCR1 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5DU2562GTR |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SFP, |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2860 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2850 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54610 |eth_chip3_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip3_model=BCM54616S |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2ch FXS (8kHz, 100V) ABS VoicePort;Legerity (Microsemi);Le88266DLC;;1; |flags=VDSL, ADSL2+, GPON, VoIP, |802dot11_protocols=abgn }} {{TagLine|Home Network Gateway}}
PCB has model number: Telsey TP460B2F
*The BCM54616S is wired to an SFP for FTTH, with an unpopulated :footprint for magnetics and a RJ45 (which would allow gigabit?) *The BCM54610 is wired to the 1x WAN (GbE) port connector, :4x LAN ports are wired to SoC [[Broadcom]] BCM6369KPBG
These were used for 100Mbps FTTH service as a PON _only_ (wifi :and usb were disabled) by ''Gagnaveita Reykjavik'' in Iceland They seem to have been used by ''Altibox'' in Norway, :and ''Amis'' in Slovenia as well
On an Icelandic box, the outside sticker declares the box to :be a CPL7, rather than the CPVL7. CPVL7 is used on all internal firmware text, bootloader options, :and is the name used on overseas versions.
===Serial=== Serial console (115200, 8n1) is available, but requires both :adding and removing solder jumpers.
==Images== *Some more images at https://imgur.com/a/IqN8Gvz [[File:Telsey-cpvl7-serial2.jpg|thumb|left|Serial port close up]]
